fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Trap your house at night. (3 use)
- Choose to incinerate all who burn at night. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you trap your house, all players who visit you will be doused. You will also blind all of your visitors through the sheer power of your flames causing them to be roleblocked the night after they visit you. This will not give any special notification to your visitors. You will not blind any Underworld members that visit you.
- When you incinerate, all players killed by the Apocalypse's ignition will be shown as "Incinerated" in the graveyard. Wills of incinerated players will be burned to ash.
- If the Apocalypse dies, you will be promoted to Apocalypse.
- You are roleblock immune.
